  • Method
com.sap.conn.idoc

Interface IDocDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDocRecord, Serializable

    public interface IDocDocument
extends IDocRecord, Serializable
    Interface that represents an IDoc. The document primarily holds the control record information of an IDoc. Furthermore it is the starting point for navigating through the contained segments providing the root segment as entry point.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CHECK_CHILD_SEGMENTS_OCCURRENCE_LIMITS
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking of child segments occurrence limits.
      static int CHECK_CURRENT_SEGMENT_ONLY
      Flag for syntax checking: Check the current segment only and do not perform any checks for its child segments.
      static int CHECK_DOCUMENT_FIELD_VALUES
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking of document's field values.
      static int CHECK_MANDATORY_CHILD_SEGMENTS
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking for mandatory child segments.
      static int CHECK_MANDATORY_DOCUMENT_FIELDS
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking for mandatory fields in the document.
      static int CHECK_MANDATORY_SEGMENTS
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking for mandatory segments in the document.
      static int CHECK_SEGMENT_FIELD_VALUES
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking of segment's field values.
      static int CHECK_SEGMENTS_OCCURRENCE_LIMITS
      Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking of document's segment occurrence limits.
      static int CHECK_WITHOUT_DOCUMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
      Flag for syntax checking: Do not check the document's field datatypes in accordance with the respective IDoc field metadata.
      static int CHECK_WITHOUT_SEGMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
      Flag for syntax checking: Do not check the segment's field datatypes in accordance with the respective IDoc field metadata.

      • CHECK_WITHOUT_DOCUMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES

        static final int CHECK_WITHOUT_DOCUMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
        Flag for syntax checking: Do not check the document's field datatypes in accordance with the respective IDoc field metadata. This flag only has an impact if being combined with the flag CHECK_DOCUMENT_FIELD_VALUES.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.12
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Flag for syntax checking: Perform checking of segment's field values.

        static final int CHECK_WITHOUT_SEGMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
        Flag for syntax checking: Do not check the segment's field datatypes in accordance with the respective IDoc field metadata. This flag only has an impact if being combined with the flag CHECK_SEGMENT_FIELD_VALUES.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.12
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • checkMandatoryFields

        void checkMandatoryFields()
                   throws IDocSyntaxException
        Checks if all mandatory fields of the document have been set and throws an IDocSyntaxException if not.
        Throws:
        IDocSyntaxException - at least one mandatory field of the document has not yet been set.

      • checkSyntax

        void checkSyntax()
          throws IDocMetaDataUnavailableException,
                 IDocSyntaxException
        Checks the document's and the contained segment's syntax using all possible syntax checks.
        Throws:
        IDocMetaDataUnavailableException - if the some meta data within the document is not available.
        IDocSyntaxException - if some syntax error has been detected.

      • checkSyntax

        void checkSyntax(int options)
          throws IDocMetaDataUnavailableException,
                 IDocSyntaxException
        Checks the document's and/or the contained segment's syntax according to the specified options.
        Possible options:
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_MANDATORY_DOCUMENT_FIELDS
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_DOCUMENT_FIELD_VALUES
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_WITHOUT_DOCUMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_MANDATORY_SEGMENTS
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_SEGMENTS_OCCURRENCE_LIMITS
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_SEGMENT_FIELD_VALUES
        • IDocDocument.CHECK_WITHOUT_SEGMENT_FIELD_DATATYPES
        The options can be combined using the bitwise OR operator "|".
        Parameters:
        options - the options for the syntax check.
        Throws:
        IDocMetaDataUnavailableException - if the some meta data within the document is not available.
        IDocSyntaxException - if some syntax error has been detected.

      • clearSegmentNumbers

        void clearSegmentNumbers()
        Removes the segment number strings from all segments belonging to this document.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.13
        See Also:
        IDocSegment.getSegmentNumber()

      • disableFieldDatatypeChecking

        void disableFieldDatatypeChecking()
        Disables the immediate field datatype checking for the document and its contained segments. If disabled, no datatype check is done for a single field when it is set.

        Caution: This method should be used with care. Sending IDocs with illegal field contents that are violating the field's defined datatype may cause ABAP system dumps and result in unrecognized partial loss of data when later being processed in an AS ABAP system.

        Specified by:
        disableFieldDatatypeChecking in interface IDocRecord
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.11

      • disableFieldDatatypeChecking

        void disableFieldDatatypeChecking(boolean applyToSegments)
        Disables the immediate field datatype checking for the document and if specified also for its contained segments. If disabled, no datatype check is done for a single field when it is set.
        Parameters:
        applyToSegments - specifying true also disables the immediate field datatype checking for the document's contained segments, specifying false does not change the documents' contained segment settings for immediate field datatype checking.

        Caution: This method should be used with care. Sending IDocs with illegal field contents that are violating the field's defined datatype may cause ABAP system dumps and result in unrecognized partial loss of data when later being processed in an AS ABAP system.

        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.11

      • disableFieldValueChecking

        void disableFieldValueChecking()
        Disables the immediate field value checking for the document and its contained segments. If disabled, no value check is done for a single field when it is set.
        Specified by:
        disableFieldValueChecking in interface IDocRecord

      • disableFieldValueChecking

        void disableFieldValueChecking(boolean applyToSegments)
        Disables the immediate field value checking for the document and if specified also for its contained segments. If disabled, no value check is done for a single field when it is set.
        Parameters:
        applyToSegments - specifying true also disables the immediate field value checking for the document's contained segments, specifying false does not change the documents' contained segment settings for immediate field value checking.

      • enableFieldDatatypeChecking

        void enableFieldDatatypeChecking()
        Enables the immediate field datatype checking for the document and its contained segments. If enabled, a datatype check is immediately done for each single field when it is set. So an additional IDocConversionException may be possibly thrown on future calls to a field's set-method.
        Specified by:
        enableFieldDatatypeChecking in interface IDocRecord
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.11

      • enableFieldDatatypeChecking

        void enableFieldDatatypeChecking(boolean applyToSegments)
        Enables the immediate field datatype checking for the document and if specified also for its contained segments. If enabled, a datatype check is immediately done for each single field when it is set. So an additional IDocConversionException may be possibly thrown on future calls to a field's set-method.
        Parameters:
        applyToSegments - specifying true also enables the immediate field datatype checking for the document's contained segments, specifying false does not change the documents' contained segment settings for immediate field datatype checking.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.11

      • enableFieldValueChecking

        void enableFieldValueChecking()
        Enables the immediate field value checking for the document and its contained segments. If enabled, a value check is immediately done for each single field when it is set. So an additional IDocSyntaxException may be possibly thrown on future calls to a field's set-method.
        Specified by:
        enableFieldValueChecking in interface IDocRecord

      • enableFieldValueChecking

        void enableFieldValueChecking(boolean applyToSegments)
        Enables the immediate field value checking for the document and if specified also for its contained segments. If enabled, a value check is immediately done for each single field when it is set. So an additional IDocSyntaxException may be possibly thrown on future calls to a field's set-method.
        Parameters:
        applyToSegments - specifying true also enables the immediate field value checking for the document's contained segments, specifying false does not change the documents' contained segment settings for immediate field value checking.

      • getNumSegments

        int getNumSegments()
        Returns the number of contained segments in the document including the root segment.
        Returns:
        the number of contained segments in the document.

      • getNumSegments

        int getNumSegments(String segmentType)
        Returns the number of contained segments of the specified segment type in the document.
        Parameters:
        segmentType - the segment type to be counted.
        Returns:
        the number of contained segments of the specified segment type in the document.

      • getRootSegment

        IDocSegment getRootSegment()
        Returns the document's root segment. The root segment does not contain any fields or other data and is only used as the general entry point for navigating through the IDoc segment tree. A root segment does not have any sibling segments.
        Returns:
        the document's root segment.

      • getIDocNumber

        String getIDocNumber()
        Returns the IDoc number (the value of the field "DOCNUM").

        Note: The IDoc number is often used as a system-wide unique ID for identifying a document. In order to achieve this, the receiving system will usually generate its own consecutive IDoc number for a transferred document.

        Returns:
        the IDoc number.
